title: John T. M. Wright Endowed Chair in Heart Valve Surgery Fund
description: To augment salary and benefits for an endowed Chair in the Division of Cardiothoracic Surgery and to support teaching, research and other projects in heart valve surgery including salaries, travel, lodging and similar expenditures.
marketingContent: To augment salary and benefits for an endowed Chair in the Division of Cardiothoracic Surgery and to support teaching, research and other projects in heart valve surgery including salaries, travel, lodging and similar expenditures.
